mapper.select: select a.*,a.name text,(case when exists(select 1 from role_section r where r.roleId=#{roleId} and r.sectionId=a.id) then true else false end) checked From section_management a Where status='启用'
mapper.update: update section_management set name = #{name}, picUrl = #{picUrl}, seq = #{seq}, type=#{type}, parentId=#{parentId}, code=#{code}, parentCode=#{parentCode}, isNavShow=#{isNavShow}, absoluteUrl=#{absoluteUrl} where id=#{id}
update section_management set status=#{status} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: Select a.* From section_management a Where 0=0 And a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update section_management set code = concat(SUBSTRING(code ,1,position(#{code} in code )-1),#{code_new},substring(code ,position(#{code} in code )+length(#{code}))), parentCode = concat(SUBSTRING(parentCode ,1,position(#{code} in parentCode )-1),#{code_new},substring(parentCode ,position(#{code} in parentCode )+length(#{code}))) Where code like '${code}%' and parentCode is not null
